DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy safety GW685698X 100mcg daily ( QD ) aqueous nasal spray vehicle placebo nasal spray adult adolescent subject ( 12 year age old ) perennial allergic rhinitis ( PAR ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of A Once-Daily Investigational Nasal Spray In Adults And Adolescents With Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR ) .
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel-Group , Multicenter Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Once-Daily , Intranasal Administration GW685698X Aqueous Nasal Spray 100mcg 4 Weeks Adult Adolescent Subjects ( 12 year age old ) Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis perennial allergic rhinitis ( PAR ) . Must comply study procedure literate . Exclusion criterion : Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid . Use allergy medication medication study . Current tobacco use . Clinically significant abnormal ECG laboratory abnormality .
